transcript.text: one it is March 10th 2017 the first
video that I'm going to be doing today I
just it's basically just a discussion
that I want to have with everyone before
we continue with the rest of the
material it's for those people that are
semi new to this game so to speak I was
speaking with the folks that I work with
and talked with and you know look
through things with and bounce ideas off
of and one of those people is Jimmy's
llama we connected through the hints
from the vault 7 topic and she actually
asked me to mention her in this because
we feel like it's really super important
and I want to lay it out there for you
guys I've been an activist or a truther
or whatever you want to call me for
several years since the day after 9/11
and I know you know a lot of things that
some of you guys didn't know until just
recently and what we're we're seeing is
basically an internet war going on right
now where there are different factions
some of them trolls some of them plants
some of them people who are meaning well
some people who think that everything in
the entire universe is a PSYOP some
people that call out people as trolls
who are just trying to you know get the
truth out there and do a good job some
people that attack other researchers and
you know call them out there's the
legitimate infighting there's the
manufactured infighting and that leaves
so many people out there in the middle
not understanding or not knowing who to
trust or who they can come to for good
information or who is really doing them
a service or
you know helping them to understand
what's going on in the right way and
there are some researchers that
completely discount those of us or those
of you I'm sorry who just started
learning about this stuff just recently
maybe you guys started waking up with
this election maybe you know he thought
that people that said 9/11 is an inside
job
and the Fed you know chemtrails are real
all those crazy tinfoil hat wearing
conspiracy theories were actually
conspiracy theories and they weren't
real and now you're starting to wake up
and say hey wait a second those people
might have been telling the truth I
personally and we ink Jim you know
Jimmy's llama and I we personally feel
like those of us who come out or those
researchers and you know YouTube
activists or people that are sharing
information that come out and basically
treat people that have just begun to
open their eyes to this as second-class
citizens so to speak are doing everyone

anyone out by name nor am I having you
know starting beef with anyone by any
stretch you know everybody's free to do
what they like I just wanted to put out
there that when I make my videos and
when llama does her blog we come at it
from a perspective like for example in
the last video I did about the CIA dump
that just came out I said you know the
CIA was spying on us oh my gosh look at

not more but you know a lot of people
didn't a lot of people thought it was
just nonsense and a lot of people had no
idea what's happening so in the comments
section when I get people saying come on
we knew about this yeah I know there's a
lot of you that watch my channel that
are really really really in tune with

educated and that's wonderful and then
there are a lot of people that come to

everybody to know that you know like
I've said so many times I'm just a
normal everyday person
walking the you know I do normal
everyday things
I'm not some amazing secret top secret
person with all I'm not I'm just I'm
really not I'm just somebody who's spent
the majority of her adult life
researching the heck out of everything
and I've accumulated in my head a lot of
knowledge about a lot of things and it's
so enlightening and wonderful to see the
rest of the world start to catch up with
those of us who've been sort of pushed

I'm not bitter
I don't harbor resentment towards people
who have you know thought one way and

coming around and I think that it's
really hard for those people to navigate
through all of the information out there
not knowing who to trust you know
there's people saying this is a PSYOP
that's a PSYOP this isn't real that

I'm basically going to this point I
present information lamma presents
information based on our intuition what

keep it in your toolkit as I say use

just read everybody side and keep those

oh my
